name: Zesty Sweet Potato Fries
author: diggler
summary: A zesty solution for the sweet potato! Dip in chipotle mayonnaise for extra flavor.
ingredients: 3  sweet potatoes, cut into French fries
1 teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste  (Optional)
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add sweet potato pieces, and boil until slightly softened, about 5 minutes
Drain and run cold water over the sweet potatoes
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat; stir in garlic and sweet potato fries
Place a lid over the skillet and let fries steam for about 5 minutes
Remove lid and sprinkle sweet potatoes with paprika, chili powder,  and seafood seasoning
Continue to fry sweet potatoes, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 10 more minutes
Season with salt and black pepper
